title: How to make overtones in overtone singing louder - Quora

response.answer_text: Get closer to the microphone. On saxophone, we think more about just getting the overtones we want. Sometimes you just can’t make them louder. Accurate overtones have a way of sounding loud enough. Being precise is more obtainable than trying to be louder. If you keep working for louder, it wears you down eventually. This is for saxophone. Vocal overtones are a strange animal. Not many singers can even do it at all.
